summary: Header and footer components were updated to reference a new generated transparent logo lockup image under `/assets/generated/`, but the required PNG asset itself was not added to `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. Additional non-requested documentation/state files were also modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new transparent PNG asset by cropping `1770306231356.png` to only the logo + “Aurelie” + “Fine Jewellery” with a transparent background, and add it under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows `Added: 0` files and no new asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, so the required generated PNG is not present in the changes.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx (references `/assets/generated/aurelie-lockup-transparent.dim_1000x320.png`, but asset file not added)

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements focus on adding an image asset and updating header/footer branding components; it does not request changes to project state metadata files.
BuildRequest does not ask to update repository summary/documentation files.
